quoteText: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
Continuous effort—not strength or intelligence—is the key to unlocking our potential.
Thousands of candles can be lit from a single, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.
I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
To make no mistakes is not in the power of man; but from their errors and mistakes the wise and good learn wisdom for the future.
You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
To be aware of a single shortcoming in oneself is more useful than to be aware of a thousand in someone else.
The deepest craving of human nature is the need to be appreciated.
The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.

{"quoteText":"Although there may be tragedy in your life, there\'s always a possibility to triumph. It doesn\'t matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.", "quoteAuthor":"Oprah Winfrey", "senderName":"", "senderLink":"", "quoteLink":"http://forismatic.com/en/04e343e383/"}

{"quoteText":"When you begin to touch your heart or let your heart be touched, you begin to discover that it\'s bottomless.", "quoteAuthor":"Pema Chodron", "senderName":"", "senderLink":"", "quoteLink":"http://forismatic.com/en/c824118513/"}

quoteText: The best remedy for a short temper is a long walk.
The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
To speak gratitude is courteous and pleasant, to enact gratitude is generous and noble, but to live gratitude is to touch Heaven.

{"quoteText":"Someone remembers, someone cares; your name is whispered in someone\'s prayers.", "quoteAuthor":"", "senderName":"", "senderLink":"", "quoteLink":"http://forismatic.com/en/6e2550585c/"}

quoteText: Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so too.
Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love.

{"quoteText":"Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn\'t know you left open.", "quoteAuthor":"John Barrymore", "senderName":"", "senderLink":"", "quoteLink":"http://forismatic.com/en/30ea805358/"}

quoteText: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.

When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
You are never given a wish without also being given the power to make it come true. You may have to work for it, however.
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
